ygData.msgSnippet: ok guys do you know how to make firewater??? it is 1 gnomish spirit and 1 water... that is waht is required.... read the book ... From: James Higgins
ygData.messageBody:
ok guys do you know how to make firewater???
it is 1 gnomish spirit and 1 water...
that is waht is required....
read the book

-----Original Message-----
From: James Higgins [mailto:higginsj@...]
Sent: Monday, October 18, 1999 2:02 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] I hate figuring out these riddles can
someoneplease spell...


From: "James Higgins" <higginsj@...>


There was a wrong ratio of water and gnomis spirits. I would lean toward
Water, 2 Gnomish Spirits, bat wings, metal shaft.

that has not been tested.

If that is true the fireqorks look like quite an inexpensive creation.
